name: ellmers
description: Ellmers is a tool for building and running DAG pipelines of AI tasks.

scripts.build: bun run build:packages && bun run build:examples
scripts.build:packages: bun run build:util && bun run build:storage && bun run build:job-queue && bun run build:task-graph && bun run build:ai && bun run build:task && bun run build:ai-provider && bun run build:test
scripts.build:examples: bun run bun run build:cli && bun run build:web
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules packages/*/*tsbuildinfo packages/*/dist packages/*/src/**/*\.d\.ts packages/*/src/**/*\.map examples/*/node_modules examples/*/dist examples/*/src/**/*\.d\.ts examples/*/src/**/*\.map
scripts.watch:packages: concurrently --kill-others -c 'auto' -n util,task-graph,task,storage,ai,provider,test 'cd packages/util && bun run watch' 'cd packages/task-graph && bun run watch' 'cd packages/tasks && bun run watch' 'cd packages/storage && bun run watch' 'cd packages/ai && bun run watch' 'cd packages/ai-provider && bun run watch' 'cd packages/test && bun run watch'
